org.sopra.api

Interface UpgradePowerLineCostCalculator


  • public interface UpgradePowerLineCostCalculator
    This interface contains the functionality to calculate the costs to upgrade the capacity of of power line.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double calculateCost(PowerLine powerLine, Playfield playfield, PowerLineType type)
      Calculate cost for upgrading a given power line to a given power line type.

    • Method Detail

      • calculateCost

        double calculateCost(PowerLine powerLine,
                     Playfield playfield,
                     PowerLineType type)

        Calculate cost for upgrading a given power line to a given power line type.

        Returned double value is positive.

        The cost to upgrade a power line are calculated by determining the Manhattan distance d of a power line at the playfield and multiplying it by the power line type dependent construction cost.

        The distance d between two points a=(x1,y1) and b=(x2,y2) is calculated as follows:

        d = |x1-x2|+|y1-y2|

        The upgrade cost do not depend on the current type of the power line.

        Parameters:
        powerLine - for which upgrade cost are calculated.
        type - to which power line shall be upgraded.
        playfield - on which power line shall be upgraded.
        Returns:
        cost for upgrading given power line.
